医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
听最喜欢的音乐对减轻急性热痛有更大的作用甚至在现代人们发现音乐可以减轻疼痛和焦虑之前，音乐已经被用来缓解疼痛几个世纪了。现在，加拿大的研究人员调查了听音乐的哪些方面可以减少疼痛感。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Listening-to-favorite-music-has-a-larger-effect-on-acute- Thermal-pain-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Listening-to-favorite-music-has-a-larger-effect-on-acute- Thermal-pain-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=89ba9ede-9927-4c1f-ae4c-ee773274f2e1 Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:29:00 -0400 Listening to favorite music has a larger effect on acute thermal pain reduction
植物基材料将成为软质医疗微型机器人的构建模块滑铁卢大学研究人员团队创造了智能、先进的材料，这些材料将成为下一代软体医疗微型机器人的构建模块。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Plant-based-materials-will-be-the-building-blocks-for-soft-medical-microrobots.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Plant-based-materials-will-be-the-building-blocks-for-soft-medical-microrobots.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96c9eccb-eac8-4115-9964-f28790ae06e6 Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:28:00 -0400 Plant-based materials will be the building blocks for soft medical microrobots
MHRA 授予艾伯维 (AbbVie) 的 Tepkinly 有条件营销授权，用于治疗侵袭性血癌艾伯维 (AbbVie) 今天宣布，英国药品和保健产品监管局已授予 Tepkinly® (epcoritamab) 有条件营销授权，作为治疗成人复发性或难治性 (R/R) 弥漫性大 B 细胞淋巴瘤 (DLBCL) 的单一疗法，经过两次或多次全身治疗后。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/MHRA-grants-conditional-marketing-authorization-for-AbbVies-Tepkinly-to-treat-aggressive-blood-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/MHRA-grants-conditional-marketing-authorization-for-AbbVies-Tepkinly-to-treat-aggressive-blood-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91fe0d2a-a330-45ac-9542-e9e2647d56cb Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:25:00 -0400 MHRA grants conditional marketing authorization for AbbVie's Tepkinly to treat aggressive blood cancer
关于更年期如何影响女性生活、健康和工作场所的新见解弗吉尼亚大学健康中心的一位健康专家和合作者发表了一篇关于更年期的全面新论文，强调了“生活的改变”可能对女性的生活、健康、工作场所甚至财务产生的深远且有时令人惊讶的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/New-insights-into-how-menopause-affects-womene28099s-lives-health-workplaces.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/New-insights-into-how-menopause-affects-womene28099s-lives-health-workplaces.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=54d8a408-613a-4bb2-9da3-45a1e87a5b77 Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:24:00 -0400 New insights into how menopause affects women’s lives, health, workplaces
人工智能帮助应对心理健康危机的五种方式人工智能正在健康领域及其他领域掀起波澜。它可以通过多种方式帮助人们改善心理和身体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Five-ways-AI-can-help-to-deal-with-the-mental-health-crisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Five-ways-AI-can-help-to-deal-with-the-mental-health-crisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4cfa2240-2f25-44eb-be18-389ef107aced Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:18:00 -0400 Five ways AI can help to deal with the mental health crisis
专家警告英国高胆固醇“无声流行”英国有史以来进行的最全面的胆固醇研究发现，54% 的英国人总胆固醇水平较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Experts-warn-of-silent-epidemic-of-high-cholesterol-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Experts-warn-of-silent-epidemic-of-high-cholesterol-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=633e41c4-e822-4c51-981d-743dcf65da98 Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:16:00 -0400 Experts warn of 'silent epidemic' of high cholesterol in the UK
糖尿病并发症使结直肠癌患者的预后恶化糖尿病并发症会对健康产生许多负面影响，从视力受损和神经损伤到肾功能障碍和心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Diabetes-complications-worsen-prognosis-for-colorectal-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231028/Diabetes-complications-worsen-prognosis-for-colorectal-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c7a42a9-01e3-4fce-b16d-1b652b3cea1b Sat, 28 Oct 2023 03:15:00 -0400 Diabetes complications worsen prognosis for colorectal cancer patients
美国心脏协会向社会企业家提供现金补助，以解决健康不平等问题美国大约有 5000 万人患心脏病和/或中风的风险较高，因为他们缺乏最基本的需求——；健康食品、清洁空气和饮用水、优质教育、就业、住房和医疗保健。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/American-Heart-Association-awards-cash-grants-to-social-entrepreneurs-to-address-health-inequities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/American-Heart-Association-awards-cash-grants-to-social-entrepreneurs-to-address-health-inequities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd24214e-aa37-46e3-a785-81a2fd0e5862 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 23:53:37 -0400 American Heart Association awards cash grants to social entrepreneurs to address health inequities
研究提供了迄今为止最全面的前列腺癌差异研究雪松-西奈癌症研究人员发现，当获得优质医疗保健的机会相同时，无论社会经济地位如何，黑人男性对晚期前列腺癌的系统治疗的反应与白人男性一样。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Study-offers-the-most-compressive-look-to-date-on-prostate-cancer-disparities.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Study-offers-the-most-compressive-look-to-date-on-prostate-cancer-disparities.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=50f0d983-b06e-443c-8aab-851f895f83d8 Fri, 27 Oct 2023 23:50:36 -0400 Study offers the most comprehensive look to date on prostate cancer disparities
与土著社区进行合乎道德的微生物组研究：合作和主权框架对构成人体微生物组的数万亿微生物的研究可以带来治疗炎症性肠综合症和糖尿病等疾病的医学突破。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Ethical-microbiome-research-with-Indigenous-communities-A-framework-for-collaboration-and-sovereignty.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231027/Ethical-microbiome-research-with-Indigenous-communities-A-framework-for-collaboration-and-sovereignty.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53b781b8-2f7f-4a4c-aef6-22ff698876ac Fri, 27 Oct 2023 23:43:17 -0400 Ethical microbiome research with Indigenous communities: A framework for collaboration and sovereignty
